price: 62. Tel est votre Seigneur, le Créateur de Toute chose. Il n’y a point d’autre divinité que Lui. Jusqu’où vous obstinerez-vous donc à ignorer (Son adoration) ?
arabic: ذَٰلِكُمُ ٱللَّهُ رَبُّكُمۡ خَٰلِقُ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ لَّآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَۖ فَأَنَّىٰ تُؤۡفَكُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: dhālikumu al-lahu rabbukum khāliqu kulli shayin lā ilāha illā huwa fa-annā tu'fakūna
